name: MonkeyWithGunsClone
description:
This is a copy of the game monkey with guns by vimlark. I made this as a 24-hour game jam hosted by my friend. At 15 seconds left in the match instakill, spikes will appear on the floor.

Player 1(Red)

Move With arrow keys

Shoot with space

Player 2(Blue)

move with analog stick

A = jump

B = Shoot

Player 3(Green)

Move with a,d

Jump = s

Shoot = j
